name: Pirate Apocalypse
description:
Hello Everyone! Thank you for trying out my first ever game! To continue playing the game after you lost, just click on the "You Died" text. If there are any issues let me know down in the comments. A donation would mean absolutely the world to me, but don't feel like you have to. If you want to support me in other ways, following me on:

Instagram: @STVN_Photos

Would help as well!

Thank you and I hope you enjoy!

P.S. : There's a bug with Mute all, it mutes the audio, however... the tag resets when you play again, but it's still muted.
